attributes.action: Redistribute Wealth away from Bankers, Lawyers, Accountants, Estate Agents, Landlords, and The Queen.
attributes.additional_details: The simple injustice of a world in which some people's work is over-valued and overpaid; the injustice of groups of people charging hourly rates of up to and over a thousand pounds an hour is obscene; And In this light, the minimum wage is an insult, multiple house ownership is slavery, and banker's bonuses following bank-created-economic-meltdown a joke.
